org.ardenus

Class Ardenus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.Ardenus

  • public final class Ardenus
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for the Ardenus game engine.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The entry point for the engine.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments for the program. All arguments prefixed with "ae_" are engine arguments, while arguments that are not prefixed will be sent to the game as startup parameters.
